body_html:
Found the cause of the issue. Working to fix the problem.
The way float value is type casted to uint8_t at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/internal/optimized/optimized_ops.h#L5506 is the root cause of the problem on ppc64le . If the calculated value is collected in a float datatype, it gives correct value.
body_text:
Found the cause of the issue. Working to fix the problem.
The way float value is type casted to uint8_t at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/internal/optimized/optimized_ops.h#L5506 is the root cause of the problem on ppc64le . If the calculated value is collected in a float datatype, it gives correct value.
body:
Found the cause of the issue. Working to fix the problem.
The way float value is type casted to uint8_t at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/internal/optimized/optimized_ops.h#L5506 is the root cause of the problem on ppc64le . If the calculated value is collected in a float datatype, it gives correct value.
